name: Beta Betton Meteora

trigger.text: KO up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 5 or less.

text: Up to 1 of your Leader or Characters gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, KO up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

effect.text: Up to 1 of your Leader or Characters gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, KO up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 3 or less.
